name: A Shard of Truth
description:
A HyperCard stack about recurrent/lucid dreams.

Find the cryptic Shard of Truth hidden in the depths of your dreams.

Then, reassemble it to find a little Truth for the dark, unrestful days and nights in your life.

The first full game for the whole team! Done in 48 hours for the Merveilles HyperJam, on April 4th and 5th 2020.

Please note: to play the game, you need to mount the .dsk file in a Macintosh emulator. You can find more information in the Installation Instructions.
